data.message:
Em, I know you take a little time to read the comments we post here now. 
I just wanted to say that, there's no person in this world, who can talk to me like you do. I was high like nothing and i was going thru some tough feelings that i can't deal on my own. I put on Beautiful pain. Damn, that second verse, it literally breathed life into me. There's one hour drive from work to home, i played beautiful pain only.. You are the best!!! I'm just 20, from Sri Lanka and was a fan since 2005.. Hardest core fan. I never comment anything but you reached my heights, you pulled me out.. We, Stans, love you sir!!
